events.question: What did you think? Was the other side as exciting as you thought it was?

events.choice: No! What the hell [i]was[/i] that place?!

events.text: Huh... thought it would have been obvious. I suppose not everyone can appreciate the beauty over there.

events.choice: You again! Who are you, damit?!

events.text: I'd tell you. You probably wouldn't believe me though. Your colleagues liked calling me by some silly number... I think it was seven, eight, three... nah, nevermind. You don't look like the sort that deal in those sort of numbers.
I know not what you mean.
Anyway... smells like you found a little mind game your colleagues like to play. Hope you know when to make your move. A mistep could be deadly.
The man in the bunny suit just seems to stare off, not even acknowleging you.
